label: Multisensor
info_inclusion:
Please press the tamper switch at the back of the device for 3-8 seconds.

After 3 seconds, the led will blink; you can now release the button. Now it's ready for learn mode (include/exclude/association). Use your controller to include the sensor to the network during this time.
info_exclusion:
Please press the tamper switch at the back of the device for 3-8 seconds.

After 3 seconds, the led will blink; you can now release the button. Now it's ready for learn mode (include/exclude/association). Use your controller to include the sensor to the network during this time.
info_wakeup: Â Press the temper button on the device and keep it for 3-7 seconds, then release.

parameters.label: Set to default
parameters.description: Set all config values to default values (factory settings).

parameters.label: Mode Timeout
parameters.description: The time used in mode 2 to turn the sensor off .
parameters.overview:
The time used in mode 2 to turn the sensor off .Â 

This Time will start running as soon as detection is seen.

parameters.label: Switch off time
parameters.description: Switch off time starts after timeout.
parameters.overview: The switch off time will start running as soon as mode timeout is done. Motion sensor is turned on and when movement is de tected again the mode timeout (cfg param 1) will start running all over again. When switch off time is done a basic off message is s

parameters.label: Sensitivity
parameters.description: The sensitivity of the motion circuit

parameters.label: Mode
parameters.description: The mode that is entered after detection

parameters.label: The temperature offset
parameters.overview: Param1,2: A signed integer to determine the offset off the temperature.
